channel.title: Your girlfriend was raped, what do you do?
channel.description:
Let's say you both was at different parties in the weekend, you had alot of fun and she got raped. She tells you she was raped, she wasn't drunk she was just having a good time, then this fat dude who she's known for a couple of years tells her he can drive her home. Once she is in the car he drives to a parklot and rape her and then drives her home.
What would you do?
Personlly - I wouldn't press charges against the motherfucker, i'd hurt him where it hurts the most, first I'd beat him up so terribly and then I would cut off his dick and pay a homeless guy to rape him over and over while I tape it, onceit's been taped I'd take a few copies of the tape and send it to his house every now and then.

item.title: Your girlfriend was raped, what do you do?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

most girls cry rape when its not. its a terrible get of jail free card American girls have been taught to use, and it really sucks for the guy because if no witnesses around everyone always takes the girls word. thats not to say that legitimate rapes don’t happen but when I hear the word party and rape i automatically assume that the girl did something stupid and is covering it up.

Happened to a guy I know. The girl accused him of sexually assaulting her, he lost his friends and I think possibly his job, too. And then right before the court date (to avoid lying under oath) the girl withdrew.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @kleber883 kleber883
item.description:
@kleber883 wrote:

Some fatty is going to be beat to near death. >.>

I wouldn’t stand for that kind of shit for a second. I’d just say I confronted him about it, and that he hit me first.

I’m skinny looking enough that it might fly. :3

item.source: Your girlfriend was raped, what do you do?

item.title: Your girlfriend was raped, what do you do?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:458605”][quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=561506.msg4099527#msg4099527 date=1347284545]

most girls cry rape when its not. its a terrible get of jail free card American girls have been taught to use, and it really sucks for the guy because if no witnesses around everyone always takes the girls word. thats not to say that legitimate rapes don’t happen but when I hear the word party and rape i automatically assume that the girl did something stupid and is covering it up.

The worst part about this is that they guy she blames has to deal with being called a rapist for the rest of his life, even if he didn’t do it. Girls take rape as a joke when they’re younger and don’t understand the consequences that come with it.

How to you detect the difference between non-rape and rape?
[/quote]any doctor can do an examination to see if there has been forced signs down there if I am not mistaken. (or at least they can normally tell on these doctor shoes )[/quote]
No, you can’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Your girlfriend was raped, what do you do?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:43, topic:458591”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=561506.msg4096846#msg4096846 date=1346958477]

If it was almost defonetly them and not much was happening I’d probably get a few of my mates and hurt him

This is how us scotsmen do it.

ikr haha!

The amount of times I’ve gotten a phonecall from one of my mates telling me they’re picking me up and going to see some pricks at a houseparty…

If I had a pound every time.

lmao:P, if I have a penny for everytime a jakie tries to square goe me ;c. I seem to have terrible luck haha!

Aw man, totally haha! Before I passed my driving test there would always be one trying to start on me at the bus station hahaha.

junkie bastards
[/quote]
Scotland the only place where knowing you’ll get beaten up by someone taking liberties is a normal thing.[/quote]

totally hahaha.

Still the best country in the world without a doubt though.

Read full topic
